00024 {

00028 Mesh::~Mesh()
00029 {
00030     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes; i++ )
00031     {
00032         delete processors[i];
00033         delete interfaces[i];
00034         delete routers[i];
00035     }
00036 
00037     for ( uint i=0 ; i<links; i++ )
00038     {
00039         delete link_a[i];
00040         delete link_b[i];
00041     }
00042 
00043 }
00044 
00045 void
00046 Mesh::init(uint p, uint v, uint c, uint bs, uint n, uint k, uint l)
00047 {
00048     ports = p;
00049     vcs = v;
00050     credits  = c;
00051     buffer_size = bs;
00052     no_nodes = n;
00053     grid_size = k;
00054     links = l;
00055 }

00057 string
00058 Mesh::print_stats()
00059 {
00060     stringstream str;
00061     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes ; i++ )
00062     {
00063         str << routers[i]->print_stats()<< endl;
00064         str << interfaces[i]->print_stats()<< endl;
00065         str << processors[i]->print_stats()<< endl;
00066     }
00067 
00068     /* Removed LT and hence there is no need for the link stats
00069     for ( uint i=0 ; i<links ; i++ )
00070     {
00071         str << link_a[i]->print_stats()<< endl;
00072         str << link_b[i]->print_stats()<< endl;
00073     }
00074      * */
00075 
00076     return str.str();
00077 }
00078 
00079 void
00080 Mesh::connect_interface_processor()
00081 {
00082     /* Connect the interfaces and the processors. And set the links for the
00083      * interfaces */
00084     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes; i++ )
00085     {
00086         processors[i]->interface_connections.push_back(interfaces[i]);
00087         interfaces[i]->processor_connection = static_cast<NetworkComponent*>(processors[i]);
00088         interfaces[i]->input_connection = link_b[i];
00089         interfaces[i]->output_connection = link_a[i];
00090     }
00091 
00092     return;
00093 }
00094 
00095 void
00096 Mesh::connect_interface_routers()
00097 {
00098     //Input and output link connections
00099     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes ; i++ )
00100     {
00101         link_a[i]->input_connection = interfaces[i];
00102         link_a[i]->output_connection = routers[i];
00103         link_b[i]->input_connection = routers[i];
00104         link_b[i]->output_connection = interfaces[i];
00105         routers[i]->input_connections.push_back(link_a[i]);
00106         routers[i]->output_connections.push_back(link_b[i]);
00107     }
00108     return;
00109 }
00110 
00111 void
00112 Mesh::connect_routers()
00113 {
00114     //  Router input and output connections
00115     map< uint , uint > east_links;
00116     map< uint , uint > west_links;
00117     /* ------------- Configure east links for the router ----------- */
00118     uint last_link_id = no_nodes;
00119     for ( uint router_no=0 ; router_no<no_nodes; router_no++ )
00120     {
00121         if( (router_no%grid_size) == 0 ) /* Left side end node */
00122         {
00123             link_a[last_link_id]->input_connection = NULL;
00124             link_a[last_link_id]->output_connection = routers[router_no];
00125             link_b[last_link_id]->input_connection = routers[router_no];
00126             link_b[last_link_id]->output_connection = NULL;
00127             east_links.insert(make_pair(router_no, last_link_id));
00128             last_link_id++;
00129         }
00130         else
00131         {
00132             link_a[last_link_id]->input_connection = routers[router_no-1];
00133             link_a[last_link_id]->output_connection = routers[router_no];
00134             link_b[last_link_id]->input_connection = routers[router_no];
00135             link_b[last_link_id]->output_connection = routers[router_no-1];
00136             east_links.insert(make_pair(router_no, last_link_id));
00137             west_links.insert(make_pair(router_no-1, last_link_id));
00138             last_link_id++;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes; i++ )
00143     {
00144         map<uint,uint>::iterator link_id = east_links.find(i);
00145         routers[i]->input_connections.push_back(link_a[link_id->second]);
00146         routers[i]->output_connections.push_back(link_b[link_id->second]);
00147     }
00148     //cout << "\n End East links " << last_link_id << endl;
00149 /* ------------ End East links --------------------- */
00150 
00151 /* ------------ Begin West links --------------------- */
00152     for ( uint router_no=0 ; router_no<no_nodes; router_no++ )
00153     {
00154         if ( (router_no%grid_size) == (grid_size-1))
00155         {
00156             link_a[last_link_id]->input_connection = routers[router_no];
00157             link_a[last_link_id]->output_connection = NULL;
00158             link_b[last_link_id]->input_connection = NULL;
00159             link_b[last_link_id]->output_connection = routers[router_no];
00160             west_links.insert(make_pair(router_no, last_link_id));
00161             last_link_id++;
00162         }
00163     }
00164 
00165     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes; i++ )
00166     {
00167         map<uint,uint>::iterator link_id = west_links.find(i);
00168         routers[i]->input_connections.push_back(link_b[link_id->second]);
00169         routers[i]->output_connections.push_back(link_a[link_id->second]);
00170     }
00171     //cout << "\n End West links " << last_link_id << endl;
00172 /* ------------ End West links --------------------- */
00173 
00174 /* ------------ Begin North links --------------------- */
00175     map< uint , uint > north_links;
00176     map< uint , uint > south_links;
00177     map < uint, uint > col_major_ordering;
00178     for ( uint i=0; i<grid_size; i++)
00179         for ( uint j=0; j<grid_size; j++)
00180             col_major_ordering.insert(make_pair(i*grid_size+j, j*grid_size+i));
00181 
00182     for ( uint router_no=0 ; router_no<no_nodes; router_no++ )
00183     {
00184         map<uint,uint>::iterator iter = col_major_ordering.find(router_no);
00185         uint col_major_router_no = iter->second;
00186         if( (col_major_router_no%grid_size) == 0 ) /* Top end node */
00187         {
00188             link_a[last_link_id]->input_connection = NULL ;
00189             link_a[last_link_id]->output_connection = routers[router_no];
00190             link_b[last_link_id]->input_connection = routers[router_no];
00191             link_b[last_link_id]->output_connection = NULL ;
00192             north_links.insert(make_pair(router_no, last_link_id));
00193             last_link_id++;
00194         }
00195         else
00196         {
00197             link_a[last_link_id]->input_connection = routers[router_no - grid_size];
00198             link_a[last_link_id]->output_connection = routers[router_no];
00199             link_b[last_link_id]->input_connection = routers[router_no];
00200             link_b[last_link_id]->output_connection = routers[router_no - grid_size];
00201             north_links.insert(make_pair(router_no, last_link_id));
00202             south_links.insert(make_pair(router_no - grid_size, last_link_id));
00203             last_link_id++;
00204         }
00205     }
00206 
00207     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes; i++ )
00208     {
00209         map<uint,uint>::iterator link_id = north_links.find(i);
00210         routers[i]->input_connections.push_back(link_a[link_id->second]);
00211         routers[i]->output_connections.push_back(link_b[link_id->second]);
00212     }
00213     //cout << "\n End North links " << last_link_id << endl;
00214 /* ------------ End North links --------------------- */
00215 
00216 /* ------------ Begin South links --------------------- */
00217 
00218     for ( uint router_no=0 ; router_no<no_nodes; router_no++ )
00219     {
00220         map<uint,uint>::iterator iter = col_major_ordering.find(router_no);
00221         uint col_major_router_no = iter->second;
00222         if ( (col_major_router_no%grid_size) == (grid_size-1))
00223         {
00224             link_a[last_link_id]->input_connection = routers[router_no];
00225             link_a[last_link_id]->output_connection = NULL;
00226             link_b[last_link_id]->input_connection = NULL;
00227             link_b[last_link_id]->output_connection = routers[router_no];
00228             south_links.insert(make_pair(router_no, last_link_id));
00229             last_link_id++;
00230         }
00231     }
00232 
00233     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes; i++ )
00234     {
00235         map<uint,uint>::iterator link_id = south_links.find(i);
00236         routers[i]->input_connections.push_back(link_b[link_id->second]);
00237         routers[i]->output_connections.push_back(link_a[link_id->second]);
00238     }
00239     //cout << "\n End North links " << last_link_id << endl;
00240 
00241     if(last_link_id > links )
00242     {
00243         cout << "ERROR : incorrect topology last_link_id: " << last_link_id << " links: " << links <<endl;
00244         exit(1);
00245     }
00246     north_links.clear();
00247     south_links.clear();
00248 /* ------------ End South links --------------------- */
00249 
00250     return;
00251 }
00252 
00253 void
00254 Mesh::setup()
00255 {
00256     /* Call setup on all components */
00257     for ( uint i=0 ; i<no_nodes ; i++ )
00258     {
00259         processors[i]->setup( no_nodes, vcs, max_sim_time);
00260         interfaces[i]->setup(vcs, credits);
00261         routers[i]->init(ports, vcs, credits, buffer_size);
00262     }
00263 
00264     for ( uint i=0 ; i<links; i++ )
00265     {
00266         link_a[i]->setup();
00267         link_b[i]->setup();
00268     }
00269     return;
00270 }
